name: Next.js headers/cookies RSC 最小
description: RSCで headers() と cookies() を使う最小例

files.template:
import { headers, cookies } from 'next/headers'; export default function Page(){ const h = headers(); const c = cookies(); return 
{JSON.stringify({ ua: h.get('user-agent'), hasSession: !!c.get('session') }, null, 2)}
; }
